function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate aisle design for social distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded aisles","Mitigation":"Create middle aisle to break up long single aisles and allow for easy reconfiguration during a pandemic","Technologies":"Flexible shelving and aisle design","People":"Customers, store staff","Owner":"Store management"},{"Description":"Inadequate capacity for infectious disease and isolation wards","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities and increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Design hospital wards for easy conversion to infectious disease and isolation wards","Technologies":"Modular building systems, flexible ward design","People":"Hospital administrators, healthcare facility planners","Owner":"Hospital management"}]}
